code:
export const getCityCode = (city, countryCode) => `${city}-${countryCode}`;
export const toCelsius = temp => Number(convertUnits(temp).from('K').to('C').toFixed(0));

sourcesContent:
export const getCityCode = ( city, countryCode) => `${city}-${countryCode}`

export const toCelsius = (temp) => Number(convertUnits(temp).from('K').to('C').toFixed(0))
